JobFullDesc:
Procore is looking for a Senior Product Manager to bring life to our mission of connecting everyone in construction on a global platform. In this role, you’ll leverage the power of the Procore Platform to build solutions for our Project Management division, our flagship area of the company. Successful candidates have built new products at scale, ideally with experience in construction technology.
The construction vertical is ripe for technological innovation, with lots of capital investment behind new ideas. Construction impacts the lives of nearly everyone in the world, and you will have the opportunity to drive innovation and make a difference. Procore is leading the market with our SaaS construction platform. We build for real people with real experiences, empowering Groundbreakers to develop and transform the communities where we all live.
This position will report to our Sr Director of Product and has the opportunity to work remotely from a US location or in our Carpinteria, CA, New York, NY, or Austin, TX office. We’re looking for someone to join our team immediately.
What you’ll do:

Oversee and execute the strategy for Project Management 
Own and execute on the product strategy that drives new ARR growth from Project Management
Work with Corporate Development and Global Partnerships teams to create and implement a build/buy/partner strategy
Collect and analyze feedback from customers, stakeholders, and other teams to shape requirements, features, and end products
Research and develop opportunities using data as an input for building hypotheses
Develop a team of stakeholders who will help deliver on a shared vision
Drive collaboration across Product, Technology, and Revenue organizations to delight our customers with innovative, unparalleled solutions that grow their businesses
Work closely with construction professionals from the field to the C-suite to identify opportunities that enhance their experience
Leverage input to guide the evolution of the Procore Platform for General Contractors, Specialty Contractors, and Owners 
Work with Product Marketing to drive roadmap communication 
Coach and mentor peer product managers 

What we're looking for: 

5+ years of experience building and delivering successful products
Bachelor’s degree, or equivalent experience
Ability to evangelize projects to build consensus within an organization
Hypothesis-driven product development
Passionate about Procore, the construction industry, and innovation 
Strong ability to influence executive leaders across the construction industry 
Expert-level ability to work with go-to-market teams
Proven track record of developing cross-functional partnerships across Product and Revenue teams
Ability to leverage strong problem-solving and analytical skills to transform challenging user experience, business, and technology problems into actionable paths
Effective communication and interpersonal skills

About Us
Procore Technologies is building the software that builds the world. We provide cloud-based construction management software that helps clients more efficiently build skyscrapers, hospitals, retail centers, airports, housing complexes, and more. At Procore, we have worked hard to create and maintain a culture where you can own your work and are encouraged and given resources to try new ideas. Check us out on Glassdoor to see what others are saying about working at Procore. 
We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome builders of all backgrounds. We thrive in a diverse, dynamic, and inclusive environment. We do not tolerate discrimination against employees on the basis of age, color, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, marital status, national origin, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other classification protected by law.
Perks & Benefits
You are a person with dreams, goals, and ambitions—both personally and professionally. That's why we believe in providing benefits that not only match our Procore values (Openness, Optimism, and Ownership) but enhance the lives of our team members. Here are just a few of our benefit offerings: competitive health care plans, unlimited paid vacation, employee stock purchase plan, employee enrichment and development programs, and friends & family events.
